metadata.title: Free DMX Tools & Calculators
metadata.description: Fast, practical DMX calculators and tools for patching and addressing: DIP switch calculator, address planner, patch sheet generator, color picker, capacity calculator, lighting power calculator, and more.

hero.label: Tools
hero.title: DMX Tools for Fast Patching
hero.body: Practical utilities for lighting techs and operators. Start with the DMX Patch Sheet Generator.

cards.title: DMX Dip Switch Calculator & Binary Converter

cards.title: DMX Address Planner & Universe Calculator
cards.description: Plan addresses on a live 512‑channel grid, detect overlaps instantly, and see universes required.

cards.title: DMX Patch Sheet Generator & Universe Planner

cards.title: DMX Color Picker & RGB to DMX Calculator
cards.description: Convert HEX or RGB to DMX values for RGB, RGBW, RGBWA, and RGBWW/CW fixtures. Optionally calculate CCT channels for accurate white blending.

cards.title: DMX Universe Capacity Calculator
cards.description: Calculate how many fixtures fit per universe and how many universes you need for your rig.

cards.description: Estimate watts, amps, and circuit headroom with safety margins and phase balancing.
